name: Earth Evading
description:
The planet of Mars, a bastion of strength and autonomy, capable of thriving without the aid of other celestial bodies.

However, it is indelibly marked by the tyrannical rule of Emperor Putler, whose oppressive regime instills fear and trepidation among its inhabitants. Any perceived transgression, whether verbal or physical, against the government is met with swift and merciless punishment.

The right to free expression is non-existent, and those who dare to speak out against the status quo are met with severe repercussions.

For nearly a quarter of a century, the Martians have been subjugated to this tyrannical rule, with many resigned to their fate, yet a small yet resilient group persists in their quest to overthrow the dictator and restore freedom to their homeland.

You will assume the role of one of these valiant individuals, determined to end the despotism of Emperor Putler.
